actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the imposition of a tax on fuel used by commercial vessels on the inland waterways.

summary.text: Imposes a tax, under the Internal Revenue Code, of four cents a gallon on any fuel sold by any vendor for use by commercial vessels on the inland waterways of the United States. Defines the terms used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the imposition of a tax on fuel used by commercial vessels on the inland waterways.
